column4: hello, my wireless keeps cutting out sporatically and then reconnecting within seconds...does this problem sound familiar to anyone???
has anybody hear of a problem where wireless signal keeps cutting in and out...sporadically....I've checked the forums and could not find anyting similar..
are there any free chat admins that can help me with my wireless question?
I am sure other people in the channel can help you. Just ask the question, and somebody will probably know.
